ThingDef.label: reaper ship hull
ThingDef.description: A block of nearly impenetrable plasteel shield. This element is usually a part of a much larger ship.

ThingDef.label: reaper support beam
ThingDef.description: A structural beam to support a ship. It can be destroyed to obtain valuable resources. This element is usually a part of a much larger ship.

ThingDef.label: reaper machinery
ThingDef.description: A block of machinery with various components. This element is usually a part of a much larger ship.

ThingDef.label: reaper resource container
ThingDef.description: A cargo module containing various raw resources often used by reapers to fix existing units or construct new ones. It can be destroyed to obtain valuable, exotic resources. This element is usually a part of a much larger ship.

ThingDef.label: reaper hull plate
ThingDef.description: A block of nearly impenetrable plasteel shield. This element is usually a part of a much larger ship.

ThingDef.label: reaper cargo module
ThingDef.description: A cargo module containing various raw resources often used by reapers to fix existing units or construct new ones. It can be destroyed to obtain valuable, exotic resources. This element is usually a part of a much larger ship.

ThingDef.label: reaper fuel cell
ThingDef.description: A cell with element zero. Extremely vulnerable to damage, explodes upon destruction.

ThingDef.label: reaper hull layer
ThingDef.description: A block of nearly impenetrable plasteel shield. This element is usually a part of a much larger ship.

ThingDef.label: reaper element zero core
ThingDef.description: A massive element zero core which, coupled with the likely enormous quantities of energies at its disposal, allows it to generate the staggering mass effect field needed to land ships of their size on a planet. This element is usually a part of a much larger ship.

ThingDef.label: reaper storm generator
ThingDef.description: A large, complex machinery that summons a perpetual reaper storm wherever it is.

ThingDef.label: reaper indoctrination core
ThingDef.description: A massive reaper construction that influences all the organic creatures. Indoctrination will slowly turn everyone berserk unless the core is disabled or destroyed.

ThingDef.label: reaper unit storage
ThingDef.description: A large shell storing reaper units. When the Reaper is damaged, Unit storage will release the reinforcements.

ThingDef.label: reaper control node
ThingDef.description: A reaper module that greatly enhances surrounding reaper forces, allowing them to utilise cover.

ThingDef.label: reaper long range missile launcher
ThingDef.description: A battery of devastating missiles. Missiles fired by the long range missile launcher raise into low orbit before they come crashing down on unsuspecting victims.

ThingDef.label: reaper claw (right)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's claw.

ThingDef.label: reaper claw (left)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's claw.

ThingDef.label: reaper small claw (left)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's small claw.

ThingDef.label: reaper small claw (right)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's small claw.

ThingDef.label: reaper large claw (left)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's large claw.

ThingDef.label: reaper large claw (right)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's large claw.

ThingDef.label: reaper small ramp (left)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's small ramp.

ThingDef.label: reaper small ramp (right)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's small ramp.

ThingDef.label: reaper large ramp (left)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's large ramp.

ThingDef.label: reaper large ramp (right)
ThingDef.description: A reaper's large ramp.

ThingDef.label: reaper bolter
ThingDef.description: A small turret with low damage and 3 shot burst.

ThingDef.label: reaper bolter
ThingDef.description: A powerful, reaper-tech bolter.

ThingDef.label: reaper heavy bolter
ThingDef.description: A medium-sized turret that fires bursts of 2 shots.

ThingDef.label: reaper heavy bolter
ThingDef.description: A powerful, reaper-tech heavy bolter.

ThingDef.label: reaper missile launcher
ThingDef.description: A medium-sized missile turret that fires single missiles over medium range.

ThingDef.label: reaper missile launcher
ThingDef.description: A powerful, reaper-tech missile launcher.

ThingDef.label: reaper kinetic artillery
ThingDef.description: A large kinetic artillery, firing devastating improved bolter shells over long distances at low accuracy.

ThingDef.label: reaper kinetic artillery
ThingDef.description: A powerful, reaper-tech kinetic artillery.

ThingDef.label: reaper orbital beam targeter
ThingDef.description: A large laser targeter that takes a long time to mark the target, which then gets bombarded by a Reaper beam from orbit. Reaper beam is absolutely devastating, but the targeter can be tricked by running from cover to cover.

ThingDef.label: reaper orbital beam targeter
ThingDef.description: A reaper-tech orbital beam targeter.

ThingDef.label: reaper beam
ThingDef.description: A powerful, magnetohydrodynamic weapon which ejects a stream of molten metal at a fraction of the speed of light, capable of tearing through a cruiser in a single sustained burst. It requires line of sight, but once it fires, the area it hits and anyone in it becomes completely annihilated.

ThingDef.label: reaper beam cannon
ThingDef.description: A reaper-tech massive beam cannon.
